meanings.sent1: His cowardices prevented him from standing up for what is right.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's cowardices were evident when he ran away from the battle.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cowardices, he managed to find a way to help his friends in need.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of cowardices followed him wherever he went, holding him back.
meanings.sent5: The cowardices in his heart whispered doubts and fears, clouding his judgment.

meanings.definition: Acts of cowardice or cowardly behavior
meanings.sent1: The cowardices of the bully were revealed when he picked on the smaller kids.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her cowardices and vowed to be braver in the future.
meanings.sent3: His cowardices led him to avoid challenges, missing out on opportunities for growth.
meanings.sent4: The cowardices of the villain were his downfall in the end.
meanings.sent5: The cowardices of the group were exposed when they abandoned their friend in trouble.
